tr.td: Co-I(s): Lynne Hillenbrand, Ilaria Pascucci, Joan Najita

body.div: We propose to obtain moderate resolution MICHELLE spectra to survey [Ne II] emission from classical T Tauri stars. We will follow up the survey on our last night with high-resolution spectra of the brightest sources to measure the line width and velocity. This program will help to identify the location of the [Ne II] emission from classical T Tauri stars. We speculate that this line probes the photoevaporation of protoplanetary disks.

ul.li: [data] [ADS] High-Resolution Spectroscopy of [Ne II] Emission from TW Hydrae
